basics.name: Hanif Bin Ariffin
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Highly experienced and independent problem solver.

work.name: Setel
work.summary: Responsible for implementing and maintaining the loyalty system for self-checkout, the inventory and the store ordering system.
highlights: Uses TypeScript for backend.
Uses React + TypeScript for frontend.

work.name: Globelise
work.summary: Recruit diverse talent, hire from anywhere, onboard compliantly, and worry no more about global payroll.
highlights: Uses Rust + Actix for backend.
Uses React + JavaScript for frontend.
Implemented various 3rd party integrations.

volunteer.summary: Multi-platform 2D and 3D game engine written in C/C++14.
highlights: Debugged various memory issues and crashes
General UI fixes.

volunteer.summary: Cross-platform Rust rewrite of the GNU coreutils.
highlights: Various improvements to more. See https://github.com/uutils/coreutils/pull/2407
Various improvements to ls.
Reimplement tr to be fully compatible with GNU tr. See https://github.com/uutils/coreutils/pull/2502

volunteer.summary: Open source. Quick from launch to every keystroke, and batteries included. Compatible alternative to Microsoft's VSCode.
highlights: Fix plugin tab not accepting keyboard inputs. See https://github.com/lapce/lapce/pull/1601
Fix some memory leak with scratch documents. See https://github.com/lapce/lapce/pull/1465
Display unique path to disambiguate multiple files with the same name. See https://github.com/lapce/lapce/pull/1521
Various other small fixes.

volunteer.summary: Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. The data model is key-value, but many different kind of values are supported: Strings, Lists, Sets, Sorted Sets, Hashes, Streams, HyperLogLogs, Bitmaps.
highlights: Suggested a change to the sds implementation to not waste some extra bits to avoid reallocation when resizing. See https://github.com/redis/redis/pull/7904
Some printf format specifier fixes
Small performance improvement when using integers smaller than 1000. See https://github.com/redis/redis/pull/11479
Discovered a crash in Redis using simple inputs involving ZSET and SET. See https://github.com/redis/redis/issues/11578

projects.name: iso_14977
highlights: Code almost maps directly to the specification using the nom parsing library

projects.name: Pinky Pie
projects.description: Cross platform GUI for MongoDB. Open source alternative to Mongo Compass.
highlights: Able to perform aggregation from the GUI

projects.name: Fatuous
highlights: Able to load simple 3D models and skyboxes
Able to render shadows

projects.name: radish
projects.description: Multithreaded implementation of redis using Golang
highlights: Simple RWLock enables this to perform 3x better than Redis when tested with redis-benchmark
